conversion_verification.notes: The render successfully converts to a 3D isometric cutaway representation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent volume and depth; isometric projection is clean and structural.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major geometric failure: the central bathroom/staircase core is completely rearranged; bathroom fixtures are now in the main living space.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture added (bed, tub) does not match the 2D plan types; bathtub is located in a living area rather than the designated bathroom.

visual_clarity.notes: Very high rendering quality and lighting, though some artifacts on door frames exist.

detected_errors.description: The central core (bathroom) of the plan is broken; bathroom fixtures (tub/sink) are rendered outside of a contained room.
Kitchen and dining areas from the 2D plan are replaced with a bedroom-style setup.

summary: While the 3D rendering quality is high, it fails to maintain the specific room logic and layout of the original floor plan, particularly regarding the bathroom and kitchen placement.
